In the GridMember player object, this object will take on the attributes of the Taha class which is shown in the constructor.

This creates the Taha object that holds most of the , for more information go to the Taha class's javadoc
playerDirection - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.GameEngine
This is the direction the player is "facing" on the Grid
playerDirection - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Taha
The integer field playerDirection keeps track where the player is facing.
playerInSight - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.NinjaOctopi
This is a boolean value that is used in the NinjaOctopi.setDirection(int, int) method to flag whether or not a Taha object is in 'sight' of the Ninja.
playerLook(String) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.GameEngine
Calls on the Grid to look in a direction depending on input given by the user from the UserInterface
playerPosition - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The array playerPosition will hold the player's current position.
playerRespawn() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The playerRespawn method is called whenever the player has been slain.
playerSeeAround() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The playerSeeAroundMethod will take the locations that are adjacent to the player and change their boolean to true which allows the cell to be "seen".
playerShoot() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.UserInterface
this method asks the user which direction to shoot then calls the shoot method in the game engine.
playerStatus() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.UserInterface
This method shows the amount of lives left and prints it on the screen, the lives are shown by called the lives method in from the game engine.
playerTurnUsedWhileInvincible() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.GameEngine
Keeps track of the turns that the player has left with the invincibility power up.
position - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Entity
The integer array size 2 position keeps track of an entities's position.
powerGain() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.PowerUp
This method sets the isUsed boolean value to true, which means the powerup has been picked up.
PowerUp - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject
 
PowerUp() - Constructor for class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.PowerUp
 
printGrid() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The printGrid method is a for loop that is used to print out the 9 x 9 grid.
printGrid() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.UserInterface
This method is used to print the grid out to the user in a form of readable strings.
printGUIGrid() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Grid
The printGUIGrid is a method that is similiar to printGrid, but instead wors with image files.
printLogo() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.UserInterface
printLogo method is just used to make the UI a bit more snazzy, it prints out an ascii logo from a file when the game is started.
printTheListofSaves() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.UserInterface
This method opens the ".savedata" file and prints out the list of save files from there to the screen, so the user can use it to type the load files name from here.
